'''Star Wars Prequel Skin Pack'''<ref>{{Cite|url=https://news.xbox.com/en-us/2015/10/23/star-wars-prequel-characters-land-on-planet-minecraft/|title=Star Wars Prequel Characters Land on Planet Minecraft|date=October 23, 2015|website=Xbox Wire|author=Xbox Wire Staff}}</ref> is a [[skin pack]] that includes 52 skins of characters from ''{{W| Star Wars: The Phantom Menace}}'', ''{{W|Star Wars: Attack of the Clones}}'', ''{{W|Star Wars: Revenge of the Sith}}'', and the 2008 animated series {{w|Star Wars: The Clone Wars (2008 TV series|''Star Wars: The Clone Wars''}}.
